abstract.p: Nestle Purina Pet Care division of Nestle consolidates creative advertising assignments for its cat and dog food brands at Fallon Worldwide, Avrett Free & Ginsberg, McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising and DDB Worldwide; dismisses Bates Worldwide and Lowe & Partners Worldwide (S)

block.p: The Nestlé Purina Pet Care division of Nestlé has consolidated creative advertising assignments for its cat and dog food brands at three agencies, dismissing two others. The consolidation of the assignments, with combined billings estimated at $200 million, came after Nestlé expanded its pet-food operations by acquiring Ralston Purina.

Fallon Worldwide in Minneapolis, part of the Publicis Groupe, which handles brands like Dog Chow and Puppy Chow in the United States, will also handle those brands overseas. Avrett Free & Ginsberg in New York and overseas offices of a sibling, McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, will team up to work on cat-food brands like Fancy Feast and Friskies in Latin America, Japan and North America; Avrett Free and McCann are part of the McCann-Erickson World Group division of the Interpublic Group of Companies.

The Nestlé Purina Pet Care division of Nestlé has consolidated creative advertising assignments for its cat and dog food brands at three agencies, dismissing two others. The consolidation of the assignments, with combined billings estimated at $200 million, came after Nestlé expanded its pet-food operations by acquiring Ralston Purina.

Fallon Worldwide in Minneapolis, part of the Publicis Groupe, which handles brands like Dog Chow and Puppy Chow in the United States, will also handle those brands overseas. Avrett Free & Ginsberg in New York and overseas offices of a sibling, McCann-Erickson Worldwide Advertising, will team up to work on cat-food brands like Fancy Feast and Friskies in Latin America, Japan and North America; Avrett Free and McCann are part of the McCann-Erickson World Group division of the Interpublic Group of Companies.
Also, DDB Worldwide, part of the Omnicom Group, joins the Nestlé agency roster, and will create campaigns in Europe for brands like Cat Chow, Felix and Friskies.
The agencies being dismissed are Bates Worldwide, part of the Cordiant Communications Group, and Lowe & Partners Worldwide, part of the Partnership division of Interpublic.
